activities: Fort Hill Company is the learning industry leader in follow-through management. Fort Hill offers both software and consulting services to enable the enterprise to drive results from learning initiatives.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For disputes that are not resolved between Fort Hill Company and the complainant, Fort Hill agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedures established by the European Data Protection Authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to Safe Harbor Principles.
